def_cn: (与 drink 和酒精饮料的名称连用，构成形容词)表示“喝太多…而烂醉的”
def_en: -sodden combines with 'drink' and with the names of alcoholic drinks to form adjectives which describe someone who has drunk too much alcohol and is in a bad state as a result.

def_cn: (与 rain 一类的词连用，构成形容词)表示“被…湿透的”
def_en: -sodden combines with words such as 'rain' to form adjectives which describe someone or something that has become extremely wet as a result of the thing that is mentioned.
